content: परिप्लु {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To swim, float. {@--2@} Tobathe, plunge into. {@--3@} To jump, spring. {@--4@} To deluge, inundate, flood. {@--5@} To cover with. {@--6@} To overwhelm. {@--7@} To fly or hover about. {@--8@} To revolve, move in a circle. {@--9@} To go astray. {@--10@} To hasten forward. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To bathe, water. {@--2@} To flood, deluge.
